about_the_game:
Plastic Tactics Online pits teams of the classic plastic soldier toys against one another in strategic turn-based combat. The battle rages in hand-crafted levels all over the house, so grab a friend and drop into the chaos!




Throw down in action figure scale levels built from a mix of everyday household objects and everything in your childhood toybox. These warzones will be loaded with hazards and environment-specific features, allowing you to strategically manipulate the layout of the battlefield- outwit, outmaneuver, outgun.

More levels will be added over the course of Early Access and beyond, so keep your eyes peeled for updates!




Move and shoot in classic 3rd Person Shooter fashion in a competitive Turn-Based Strategy game- shoot it out with powerful weapons or flank your foes to knock them off the level into the abyss. Plan your moves carefully and smash the enemy!




Enter the top-down Recon Mode to plan your attack, then use the Sprint ability to get into position or the Lock ’n’ Load ability to bring the pain. Scavenge weapons and equipment ranging from the Bazooka to the Swap Gun from randomized pickups to fuel the chaos and encourage creativity and improvisation. More gear will be launched over the course of development to open up new playstyles in response to how our players strategize- stay tuned for more!
